home.title: Data Science & Bioinformatics
home.subtitle: Exploring the intersection of computational biology and data science to unlock insights from complex biological data and drive scientific discovery.
home.featuredWorkSubtitle: Recent projects and research in data science and bioinformatics
home.dataScienceDescription: Machine learning models, statistical analysis, and data visualization techniques for biological and clinical datasets.
home.bioinformaticsDescription: Genomic analysis, sequence alignment, phylogenetic studies, and computational approaches to biological problems.
home.skillsSubtitle: Technologies and methodologies I work with

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate about bridging the gap between biology and computation
about.backgroundText: I'm a computational biologist with a passion for extracting meaningful insights from complex biological data. My work spans across genomics, proteomics, and systems biology, utilizing cutting-edge data science techniques to address fundamental questions in life sciences.
about.educationExperienceText: With a strong foundation in both computer science and biology, I bring a unique perspective to interdisciplinary research. My experience includes working with large-scale genomic datasets, developing computational pipelines, and collaborating with wet-lab researchers to translate computational findings into biological insights.
